# Extra Theme Colors

To add extra colors you must extend **[BaseTheme](/docs/theme/default-heme#basetheme-props)** object.

## Extend default theme

If you need to customize the default theme by adding custom colors to match your design requirements, you can extend the **[BaseTheme](/docs/theme/default-heme#basetheme-props)** object from `ra-theme-context`.


import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

### Javascript

<Tabs>
<TabItem value="js-function-component" label="JavaScript">

```jsx showLineNumbers
// highlight-start
import { light } from 'ra-theme-context';
// highlight-end

const myThemeColors = {
  ...light,
  // highlight-start
  color1: '#C51162', //New color
  color2: '#7B1FA2', //New color
  // highlight-end
  primary: '#4A148C' /* This line changes primary color.
                        In the same way you can change any default color */
};

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myThemeColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="js-class-component" label="Class Component">

```jsx showLineNumbers
// highlight-start
import ThemeContext, { light } from 'ra-theme-context';
// highlight-end

const myThemeColors = {
  ...light,
  // highlight-start
  color1: '#C51162', //New color
  color2: '#7B1FA2', //New color
  // highlight-end
  primary: '#4A148C' /* This line changes primary color.
                        In the same way you can change any default color */
};

class App extends React.Component {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myThemeColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```
</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### TypeScript

<Tabs>
<TabItem value="ts-function-component" label="Function Component" default>

```jsx showLineNumbers
import { ColorValue } from 'react-native';

// highlight-start
import ThemeContext, { BaseTheme, light } from 'ra-theme-context';

type MyExtraColorsProps = {
  color1: ColorValue;
  color2: ColorValue,
}
// highlight-end

const myExtraColors: BaseTheme<MyExtraColorsProps> = {
  ...light,
  // highlight-start
  color1: '#C51162', //New color
  color2: '#7B1FA2', //New color
  // highlight-end
  primary: '#4A148C' /* This line changes primary color.
                        In the same way you can change any default color */
};

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myExtraColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```
</TabItem>

<TabItem value="ts-class-component" label="Class Component">

```jsx showLineNumbers
import { ColorValue } from 'react-native';

// highlight-start
import ThemeContext, { BaseTheme, light } from 'ra-theme-context';

type MyExtraColorsProps = {
  color1: ColorValue;
  color2: ColorValue,
}
// highlight-end

const myExtraColors: BaseTheme<MyExtraColorsProps> = {
  ...light,
  // highlight-start
  color1: '#C51162', //New color
  color2: '#7B1FA2', //New color
  // highlight-end
  primary: '#4A148C' /* This line changes primary color.
                        In the same way you can change any default color */
};

class App extends React.Component<{}, {}> {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myExtraColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```
</TabItem>
</Tabs>

## Extend custom theme

### Javascript

<Tabs>
<TabItem value="js-function-component-1" label="Function Component" default>

```jsx showLineNumbers
// highlight-start
import ThemeContext from 'ra-theme-context';
// highlight-end

const myThemeColors = {
  default: '#4A148C',
  background: "#C5CAE9",
  card: "#E8EAF6",
  text: '#ffffff',
  border: '#9FA8DA',
  info: "#00E5FF",
  success: "#00C853",
  warning: "#F9A825",
  error: "#B71C1C",
  dark: "#212121",
  secondary: "#F50057",
  primary: '#4A148C',
  light: "#ebebeb",
  // highlight-start
  color1: '#C51162', //New color
  color2: '#7B1FA2', //New color
  // highlight-end
};

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myExtraColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="js-class-component-1" label="Class Component">

```jsx showLineNumbers
// highlight-start
import ThemeContext from 'ra-theme-context';
// highlight-end

const myThemeColors = {
  default: '#4A148C',
  background: "#C5CAE9",
  card: "#E8EAF6",
  text: '#ffffff',
  border: '#9FA8DA',
  info: "#00E5FF",
  success: "#00C853",
  warning: "#F9A825",
  error: "#B71C1C",
  dark: "#212121",
  secondary: "#F50057",
  primary: '#4A148C',
  light: "#ebebeb",
  // highlight-start
  color1: '#C51162', //New color
  color2: '#7B1FA2', //New color
  // highlight-end
};

class App extends React.Component {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: themeColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

```jsx showLineNumbers
  text: '#ffffff',

  error: "#B71C1C",
  dark: "#212121",
  secondary: "#F50057",
  primary: '#4A148C',
  light: "#ebebeb",
  // highlight-start
  color1: '#C51162', //New color
  color2: '#7B1FA2', //New color
  // highlight-end

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myThemeColors}}>

```
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="class-component" label="Class Component">

```jsx showLineNumbers
import { ColorValue } from 'react-native';

// highlight-start
import ThemeContext, { BaseTheme } from 'ra-theme-context';

type MyExtraColorsProps = {
  color1: ColorValue;
  color2: ColorValue,
}
// highlight-end

const myExtraColors: BaseTheme<MyExtraColorsProps> = {
  default: '#4A148C',
  background: "#C5CAE9",
  card: "#E8EAF6",
  text: '#ffffff',
  border: '#9FA8DA',
  info: "#00E5FF",
  success: "#00C853",
  warning: "#F9A825",
  error: "#B71C1C",
  dark: "#212121",
  secondary: "#F50057",
  primary: '#4A148C',
  // highlight-start
  color1: '#C51162', //New color
  color2: '#7B1FA2', //New color
  // highlight-end
};

class App extends React.Component<{}, {}> {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myExtraColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
